    • Constructor Detail

      • Population

        public Population​(java.util.Random r,
                  Plate[] problems,
                  int initialPopulationSize,
                  int moveThreshold)
        Randomly generate a population of individuals.
        Parameters:
        r - Random number generator.
        problems - Array of problems that the individuals need to solve.
        initialPopulationSize - Amount of individuals to be randomly generated.s
        moveThreshold - Maximum gene size.

    • Method Detail

      • tournamentSelection

        public void tournamentSelection​(java.util.Random r,
                                java.lang.String fitnessType,
                                int n,
                                int ps)
        Applies the tournament selection to the population and adds the selected individuals to the selected list.
        Parameters:
        r - Random number generator.
        fitnessType - Flag that indicates type of individual to be selected from the participants.
        n - Number of rounds of each tournament selection.
        ps - Number of participants of each tournament selection.

      • randomSelection

        public void randomSelection​(java.util.Random r,
                            int n)
        Randomly selects n individuals, without considering it's fitness and add's selected individuals to the selected list.
        Parameters:
        r - Random number generator.
        n - Amount of individuals to select.

      • rouletteWheelSelection

        public void rouletteWheelSelection​(java.util.Random r,
                                   int n)
        Applies the roulette wheel selection to the population and adds the selected individuals to the selected list.
        Parameters:
        r - Random number generator.
        n - Amount of individuals to select.

      • singlePoint

        public void singlePoint​(java.util.Random r)
        Applies the single point recombination algorithm to the selected list, where all selected individuals will generate offspring with each other. The offspring will be added to the population.
        Parameters:
        r - Random number generator.

      • bitFlip

        public void bitFlip​(java.util.Random r,
                    double threshold)
        Perform the bit flip mutation algorithm to the population, the individual being selected based on chance.
        Parameters:
        r - Random number generator
        threshold - Fraction that, if the number generated by r is lesser than, will apply the bit flip algorithm to.

      • multiBitFlip

        public void multiBitFlip​(java.util.Random r,
                         int amount,
                         double threshold)
        Perform the multi bit flip mutation algorithm to the population, the individual being selected based on chance.
        Parameters:
        r - Random number generator
        amount - Amount of points to apply the bit flip mutation.
        threshold - Fraction that, if the number generated by r is lesser than, will apply the bit flip algorithm to.

      • restartGene

        public void restartGene​(java.util.Random r,
                        double threshold)
        Randomly select individuals whose generated value is lesser than the threshold, and restart their genes.
        Parameters:
        r - Random number generator.
        threshold - Fraction that, if the number generated by r is lesser than, will apply the bit flip algorithm to.

      • restartGeneWorst

        public void restartGeneWorst​(java.util.Random r,
                             int amount)
        Restart the genes of individuals with the worst fitness.
        Parameters:
        r - Random number generator
        amount - number of individuals with the worst fitness to get their genes restarted.

      • restartGeneIfNoSolutionFound

        public void restartGeneIfNoSolutionFound​(java.util.Random r)
        Parameters:

      • decimatePopulationByFitness

        public void decimatePopulationByFitness​(java.lang.String fitnessType,
                                        int amount)
        Decimates a given amount of individuals from the population.
        Parameters:
        fitnessType - "best" for the individuals with the highest fitness, "worst" otherwise.
        amount - Number of individuals to decimate.

      • decimateSelectedByFitness

        public void decimateSelectedByFitness​(java.lang.String fitnessType,
                                      int amount)
        Decimates a given amount of individuals from the selected population.
        Parameters:
        fitnessType - "best" for the individuals with the highest fitness, "worst" otherwise.
        amount - Number of individuals to decimate.

      • decimateOffspringByFitness

        public void decimateOffspringByFitness​(java.lang.String fitnessType,
                                       int amount)
        Decimates a given amount of individuals from the offspring population.
        Parameters:
        fitnessType - "best" for the individuals with the highest fitness, "worst" otherwise.
        amount - Number of individuals to decimate.

                               int amount,
                               java.util.List<Individual> population)
        Decimates a given amount of individuals from the given list.
        Parameters:
        fitnessType - "best" for the individuals with the highest fitness, "worst" otherwise.
        amount - Number of individuals to decimate.
        population - List of individuals to decimate from.
